title: Single parent household recognized in community leadership
description: Single parent household recognized in community leadership
content:
Scenario: Single parent household recognized in community leadership
    Given Maria's care contributions are extraordinary
    And she deserves voice in community governance despite time constraints
    When community leadership positions are filled
    Then Maria's quantified care work should be visible qualification
    And her solo parenting should be recognized as demonstrated community commitment
    And community should make leadership accessible to time-constrained parents
    And single parents should have governance voice proportionate to care contributions
    And Maria should be valued as community leader, not marginalized as struggling victim
